rows.label: bf02070100_0010
rows.name: I see. So you two are off to Eden.

rows.label: bf02070100_0020
rows.name:
Listen, I never thanked you properly.
For saving us, I mean.

rows.label: bf02070100_0030
rows.name:
Byakko said that you...
carried us all the way here.

rows.label: bf02070100_0040
rows.name: We owe you our lives, Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf02070100_0050
rows.name:
No need to thank me. After all,
you were the ones who saved Rex.

rows.label: bf02070100_0060
rows.name: Don't mention it.

rows.label: bf02070100_0070
rows.name:
So you Divine Beasts can regenerate.
Pretty handy.

rows.label: bf02070100_0080
rows.name: This isn't something just any old Divine Beast ca-

rows.label: bf02070100_0090
rows.name: You can retire that line now.

rows.label: bf02070100_0100
rows.name: Excuse me?! I'd like less of that attitude!

rows.label: bf02070100_0110
rows.name:
If you had listened to me and declined that reckless
job to begin with, we wouldn't be in this mess!

rows.label: bf02070100_0120
rows.name:
"Take a nap" you said, like I was
some kind of doddery old man...

rows.label: bf02070100_0130
rows.name:
Okay, okay, I get it!
I'm a terrible disappointment.

rows.label: bf02070100_0140
rows.name: Look how sorry I am!

rows.label: bf02070100_0150
rows.name:
Can you not muster even a
shred of sincere remorse?

rows.label: bf02070100_0160
rows.name: Sorry, but I can't.

rows.label: bf02070100_0170
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf02070100_0180
rows.name:
If I hadn't taken the job, they'd have
got their hands on Homura.

rows.label: bf02070100_0190
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: bf02070100_0200
rows.name:
I couldn't let that happen. No way.
They can never take her.

rows.label: bf02070100_0210
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...
